channel.title: Homes on Saurabh Jha - Ph.D. Candidate at University of Illinois at Urbana Champaign
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Saurabh Jha - Ph.D. Candidate at University of Illinois at Urbana Champaign

item.description: Biography I am a Ph.D. candidate in the department of Computer Science at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign advised by Ravishankar Iyer and Zbigniew Kalbarczyk in the DEPEND group at the Coordinated Science Laboratory. My current work focuses on dependability assessment and design of fault-tolerant large-scale High-Performance Computing and Autonomous Systems. I am currently working on “Holistic, Measurement-Driven Resilience”, HMDSA, “Computer System Failure Data Repository to Enable Data-Driven Dependability Research”, and “Dependability of Autonomous Vehicles” projects.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Teaching Assistantship: - Data Science for Engineers (UIUC), mentioned in “Teachers Ranked as Excellent” by students - Artificial Intelligence (VIT University) - Heterogeneous Programming (VIT University)
